explains: adj. 该死的；讨厌的；受诅咒的

sentences.en: It's the only way to get him to goddamn.
sentences.cn: 这他妈是唯一能让他听我讲话的方法！

sentences.en: You talk to anybody, I notice. You don't give a goddamn.
sentences.cn: 我注意到你跟谁都讲话，你根本不在乎。

sentences.en: Don't you know that? Don't you know that goddamn secret yet?
sentences.cn: 你们难道不知道那吗，你们还不知道这个秘密吗？
